titles.title: For the relief of Gracekutty Thomas and her son Gladwin Thomas.
For the relief of Gracekutty Thomas and her son Gladwin Thomas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Declares Gracekutty Thomas and her son, Gladwin Thomas, to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.
